pages.title: Ritual Note
pages.text: Craft yourself a candle ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform a $(d)Candle Ritual$(). This is required for creating any non-basic candle.

pages.title: Preforming Rituals
pages.text: Once the ritual is setup according to the note, you can right click a $(d)Rune$() on the center candle to empower it. This will yield a Candle matching the corresponding rune type.
